description:
This software takes JSON and YAML files, and after running them through a linter, sorts the keys of objects alphabetically. This helps prevent the following problems when checking these data/config files into repositories:
Problems where the entire file looks like it was removed and added due to
Indentation changes Key sorting differences
Merging issues when 2 or more people add data to the same or similar locations
name: Pretty Linter GrumPhP
